casebody.data:
THE UNITED STATES, PETITIONER, v. BRAND INVESTMENT COMPANY [No. 44617]

[Ante, p. 40; 324 U. S. —]

Government contract; unjustified stop order a breach of contract; proportionate part of main office overhead recoverable for delay.

Decided June 5,1944; judgment for plaintiff. Defendant’s motion for new trial overruled October 2,1944. Ante, p. 40.

Defendant’s petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court, February 26,1945.
